creator: Orlando City SC
descriptionHtml:
Download the official LionNation App for free. Upon downloading it, fans can choose to create a free LionNation account or subscribe to LionNation Premium for $59/year for exclusive discounts, prizes, and experiences.

Key App Features:

Mobile Ticketing
- Purchase, manage, and scan your tickets all in one place for a seamless mobile ticketing experience at Exploria Stadium.

Match Center
- Immerse yourself on gameday with real-time match data, live score updates, play-by-play commentary, and vote for your Heineken Star of the Match all in one place.
- Attending a match at Exploria Stadium? The app will help you find your way around, from gates, to restrooms, to Team Store or Food & Beverage concessions.

News & Videos
- Stay in the know and get real-time notifications on players signings, injury updates, lineups, team news and announcements.

Schedule & Standings
- Check out the upcoming City and Pride matches and stay up-to-date on how we stack up against MLS and NWSL competition.

LionNation Points & Rewards
- Manage your LionNation account, earn and track your points, exchange them for rewards, and take advantage of your LionNation member discounts much more efficiently.

Player Profiles
- Learn more about your favorite players and track their individual performances over the course of the season.

Supporter Chants
- Access your cheatsheet for the most iconic Supporters chants and get ready to Man The Wall.

Team Store
- Shop the latest Orlando City and Orlando Pride official gear directly from the app.

Exclusive Quizzes
- Test your Orlando City and Orlando Pride knowledge and earn points and exclusive prizes.

Official Polls and Surveys
- Provide your feedback and cast your votes via official polls and surveys, or contact the club directly through the app.

Download the New LionNation App now!
